commit.message:
expr.c (expand_expr_real_1): Force subregs into a pseudo before applying gen_lowpart.

        * expr.c (expand_expr_real_1) <VIEW_CONVERT_EXPR>: Force subregs
        into a pseudo before applying gen_lowpart.

From-SVN: r103712

files.patch:

+	into a pseudo before applying gen_lowpart.
